title: Chicken and spinach balti
description: This fresh-tasting easy chicken curry is a delicious recipe to have up your sleeve when you’re cooking for two.
ingredients: 2 chicken breasts, cut into bite-sized pieces
1 red onion, peeled and finely sliced
2 tomatoes, seeds removed, flesh finely chopped
small handful fresh coriander leaves, chopped
100g/3½oz basmati rice, rinsed and drained, then cooked according to packet
